docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: 主页

docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org .
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: 查询已被授权人员 url:/tools/authorizedUser/ 方法:GET 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id 示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "核心网运行部": [ { "华为数据组": [ "zz", "sunbo222" ] }, { "诺基亚组": [ "sunbo" ] } ], "监控部": [ { "C&M小组": [ "lll" ] } ] }, "msg": "查询成功" } 查询已被授权人员列表 url:/tools/authorizedUser/list 方法:GET 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id 查询未授权人员 url:/tools/unauthorizedUser/ 方法:GET 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id 示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "核心网运行部": [ { "诺基亚组": [ "sunbo" ] } ], "监控部": [ { "C&M小组": [ "lll" ] } ] }, "msg": "查询成功" } 为工具添加组的权限 url:/tools/authorityAdd/group/ 方法:POST 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id group_id: 组id 【多个组以';'号隔开】 为工具添加人的权限 url:/tools/authorityAdd/user/ 方法:POST 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id user_id: 人id 【多个人以';'号隔开】
docs.title: 权限

docs.text: url:/tools/authorizedUser/ 方法:GET 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id 示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "核心网运行部": [ { "华为数据组": [ "zz", "sunbo222" ] }, { "诺基亚组": [ "sunbo" ] } ], "监控部": [ { "C&M小组": [ "lll" ] } ] }, "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 查询已被授权人员

docs.text: url:/tools/authorizedUser/list 方法:GET 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id
docs.title: 查询已被授权人员列表

docs.text: url:/tools/unauthorizedUser/ 方法:GET 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id 示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "核心网运行部": [ { "诺基亚组": [ "sunbo" ] } ], "监控部": [ { "C&M小组": [ "lll" ] } ] }, "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 查询未授权人员

docs.text: url:/tools/authorityAdd/group/ 方法:POST 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id group_id: 组id 【多个组以';'号隔开】
docs.title: 为工具添加组的权限

docs.text: url:/tools/authorityAdd/user/ 方法:POST 请求参数: tool_id: 工具id user_id: 人id 【多个人以';'号隔开】
docs.title: 为工具添加人的权限

docs.text: 运行 url:/schedule/run/ 方法:POST 请求参数: id: 工具id params: 参数 字典格式{} 示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 17, "task_id": "f10e336c-bbb9-4643-9a18-2fdf29fc9a3f", "task_name": "21574384240", "status": "PENDING", "result": "", "create_time": "2019-11-22T00:57:20.850Z" }, "msg": "调用成功" } 查询运行状态 url:/schedule/run/ 方法:GET 请求参数: id: 任务id { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 17, "task_id": "f10e336c-bbb9-4643-9a18-2fdf29fc9a3f", "task_name": "21574384240", "status": "SUCCESS", "result": "this is a test", "create_time": "2019-11-22T00:57:20.850Z" }, "msg": "查询成功" } PENDING = 'PENDING': 任务准备中 STARTED = 'STARTED': 任务开始 SUCCESS = 'SUCCESS': 任务成功 RUNNING = 'RUNNING': 任务运行中 FAILURE = 'FAILURE': 任务失败
docs.title: 调度

docs.text: url:/schedule/run/ 方法:POST 请求参数: id: 工具id params: 参数 字典格式{} 示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 17, "task_id": "f10e336c-bbb9-4643-9a18-2fdf29fc9a3f", "task_name": "21574384240", "status": "PENDING", "result": "", "create_time": "2019-11-22T00:57:20.850Z" }, "msg": "调用成功" }
docs.title: 运行

docs.text: url:/schedule/run/ 方法:GET 请求参数: id: 任务id { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 17, "task_id": "f10e336c-bbb9-4643-9a18-2fdf29fc9a3f", "task_name": "21574384240", "status": "SUCCESS", "result": "this is a test", "create_time": "2019-11-22T00:57:20.850Z" }, "msg": "查询成功" } PENDING = 'PENDING': 任务准备中 STARTED = 'STARTED': 任务开始 SUCCESS = 'SUCCESS': 任务成功 RUNNING = 'RUNNING': 任务运行中 FAILURE = 'FAILURE': 任务失败
docs.title: 查询运行状态

docs.text: 查询用户信息 url: users/userInfo/ 方法：GET 参数: 用户id：id 返回示例： is_active: 账号是否激活，False表示账号被停用 role: 账号角色；1管理员，2用户，3游客 username: 用户名 group: 组 depart: 部门 id: id phone: 手机号 { "status": 1, "data": { "id": id, "username": "sunbo", "phone": "15268117291", "is_active": true, "role": 管理员, "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部" }, "msg": "查询成功" } 编辑账号信息 url: users/userInfo/ 方法：PUT 参数: id: 被修改账号的id username:被修改账号的用户名 password:被修改账号的密码 phone:被修改账号的手机号 group_id:被修改账号的组id role:被修改账号的角色（1，2，3） 1, 管理员 2, 用户 3, 游客 删除账号 url: users/userInfo/ 方法：DELETE 参数: 用户：id 需要删除的账号id 获取csrf_token url:/users/csrftoken/ 方法:GET 登录 url:/users/login/ 方法:POST 请求参数: 用户名：username 密码：password 返回信息示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 1, "username": "sunbo", "session_id": "44ohfud9s6kkjfo3m5a3olr42mu5w2pp"， "phone": "8888888", "group": "test", "depart": "test", "role": "用户" }, "msg": "登录成功" } 退出登录 url:/users/loginout/ 方法:GET 请求参数: 无 查询所有启用账号信息 url: users/active/ 方法: GET 参数: is_active: 1代表启用账号 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 1, "username": "sunbo", "phone": "15268117291", "role": "用户", "group": "test", "depart": "test", "is_active": true }, { "id": 2, "username": "sunbo2", "phone": "test", "role": "管理员", "group": "test", "depart": "test", "is_active": true }, { "id": 4, "username": "zz", "phone": "15235918053", "role": "管理员", "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部", "is_active": true }, { "id": 5, "username": "zzz", "phone": "15235918053", "role": "管理员", "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部", "is_active": true }, { "id": 6, "username": "zzzzzzz", "phone": "15235918053", "role": "管理员", "group": "chatops小组", "depart": "监控部", "is_active": true } ], "msg": "查询成功" } 查询所有停用账号信息 url: users/active/ 方法: GET 参数: is_active: 0代表停用账号 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 3, "username": "sunbo3", "phone": "test", "role": "管理员", "group": "test", "depart": "test", "is_active": false } ], "msg": "查询停用状态账号成功" } 启用账号 url: users/active/ 方法: POST 参数: id: 被修改账号id is_active: 1代表启用账号 停用账号 url: users/active/ 方法: POST 参数: id: 被修改账号id is_active: 0代表停用账号 修改角色 url: users/role/ 方法: POST 参数: id:用户名 role:状态 1 管理员 2 用户 3 游客 用户注册 url:/users/register/ 方法:POST 请求参数: username:注册账号用户名 password:注册账号密码 role:注册账号密码角色 group:注册账号组名 phone:注册账号手机号 返回信息示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "username": "sunbo3", "phone": "test", "role": "1" }, "msg": "注册成功" } 账号管理首页模糊查询 url: users/serInfo/contain/ 方法: GET 参数: name: 输入的查询信息 用户列表 url: users/all/ 方法: GET 参数: 用户：username { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 1, "role": "管理员", "username": "sunbo", "status": true, "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部" }, { "id": 2, "role": "管理员", "username": "sunbo2", "status": true, "group": "test", "depart": "test" }, { "id": 3, "role": "管理员", "username": "sunbo3", "status": true, "group": "test", "depart": "test" }, { "id": 4, "role": "管理员", "username": "zz", "status": true, "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部" } ], "msg": "查询成功" } 添加部门 url: users/department 方法: POST 参数: 部门名: name 示例 { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 6, "name": "test" }, "msg": "添加成功" } id 部门id name 部门名字 添加组 url: users/group 方法: POST 参数: 组名: group_name 部门id: depart_id 示例 { "status": 1, "data": { "group_name": "test", "depart_id": "6", "id": 8 }, "msg": "添加成功" } 查询所有部门 url: users/departments/ 方法: GET 示例 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 2, "group_name": "核心网运行部" }, { "id": 3, "group_name": "监控部" }, { "id": 4, "group_name": "业务系统运行部" }, { "id": 5, "group_name": "移动互联网" }, { "id": 6, "group_name": "test" } ], "msg": "查询成功" } 查询部门下所有组 url: users/department/groups/ 方法: GET 参数: 部门: depart_name 示例 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 2, "group_name": "华为数据组" }, { "id": 3, "group_name": "诺基亚组" } ], "msg": "查询成功" } 查询组下所有工具 url: users/group/tools/ 方法: GET 参数: 组名: group_name 查询组下所有成员 url: users/group/users/ 方法: GET 参数: 组名: group_name 首页部门组合工具信息接口 url: users/detailInfo/ 方法: GET 参数:无 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "name": "核心网运行部", "key": "front_one", "id": 2, "children": [ { "name": "华为数据组", "key": "front_two", "id": 2, "children": [] }, { "name": "诺基亚组", "key": "front_two", "id": 3, "children": [] } ] }, { "name": "监控部", "key": "front_one", "id": 3, "children": [ { "name": "chatops小组", "key": "front_two", "id": 4, "children": [] }, { "name": "C&M小组", "key": "front_two", "id": 5, "children": [] } ] }, { "name": "业务系统运行部", "key": "front_one", "id": 4, "children": [] }, { "name": "移动互联网", "key": "front_one", "id": 5, "children": [ { "name": "EPC组", "key": "front_two", "id": 6, "children": [] }, { "name": "大IP组", "key": "front_two", "id": 7, "children": [] } ] }, { "name": "test", "key": "front_one", "id": 6, "children": [ { "name": "test", "key": "front_two", "id": 8, "children": [] }, { "name": "test2", "key": "front_two", "id": 9, "children": [] } ] } ], "msg": "请求成功" }
docs.title: 用户

docs.text: url: users/userInfo/ 方法：GET 参数: 用户id：id 返回示例： is_active: 账号是否激活，False表示账号被停用 role: 账号角色；1管理员，2用户，3游客 username: 用户名 group: 组 depart: 部门 id: id phone: 手机号 { "status": 1, "data": { "id": id, "username": "sunbo", "phone": "15268117291", "is_active": true, "role": 管理员, "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部" }, "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 查询用户信息

docs.text: url: users/userInfo/ 方法：PUT 参数: id: 被修改账号的id username:被修改账号的用户名 password:被修改账号的密码 phone:被修改账号的手机号 group_id:被修改账号的组id role:被修改账号的角色（1，2，3） 1, 管理员 2, 用户 3, 游客
docs.title: 编辑账号信息

docs.text: url: users/userInfo/ 方法：DELETE 参数: 用户：id 需要删除的账号id
docs.title: 删除账号

docs.text: url:/users/csrftoken/ 方法:GET
docs.title: 获取csrf_token

docs.text: url:/users/login/ 方法:POST 请求参数: 用户名：username 密码：password 返回信息示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 1, "username": "sunbo", "session_id": "44ohfud9s6kkjfo3m5a3olr42mu5w2pp"， "phone": "8888888", "group": "test", "depart": "test", "role": "用户" }, "msg": "登录成功" }
docs.title: 登录

docs.text: url:/users/loginout/ 方法:GET 请求参数: 无
docs.title: 退出登录

docs.text: url: users/active/ 方法: GET 参数: is_active: 1代表启用账号 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 1, "username": "sunbo", "phone": "15268117291", "role": "用户", "group": "test", "depart": "test", "is_active": true }, { "id": 2, "username": "sunbo2", "phone": "test", "role": "管理员", "group": "test", "depart": "test", "is_active": true }, { "id": 4, "username": "zz", "phone": "15235918053", "role": "管理员", "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部", "is_active": true }, { "id": 5, "username": "zzz", "phone": "15235918053", "role": "管理员", "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部", "is_active": true }, { "id": 6, "username": "zzzzzzz", "phone": "15235918053", "role": "管理员", "group": "chatops小组", "depart": "监控部", "is_active": true } ], "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 查询所有启用账号信息

docs.text: url: users/active/ 方法: GET 参数: is_active: 0代表停用账号 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 3, "username": "sunbo3", "phone": "test", "role": "管理员", "group": "test", "depart": "test", "is_active": false } ], "msg": "查询停用状态账号成功" }
docs.title: 查询所有停用账号信息

docs.text: url: users/active/ 方法: POST 参数: id: 被修改账号id is_active: 1代表启用账号
docs.title: 启用账号

docs.text: url: users/active/ 方法: POST 参数: id: 被修改账号id is_active: 0代表停用账号
docs.title: 停用账号

docs.text: url: users/role/ 方法: POST 参数: id:用户名 role:状态 1 管理员 2 用户 3 游客
docs.title: 修改角色

docs.text: url:/users/register/ 方法:POST 请求参数: username:注册账号用户名 password:注册账号密码 role:注册账号密码角色 group:注册账号组名 phone:注册账号手机号 返回信息示例： { "status": 1, "data": { "username": "sunbo3", "phone": "test", "role": "1" }, "msg": "注册成功" }
docs.title: 用户注册

docs.text: url: users/serInfo/contain/ 方法: GET 参数: name: 输入的查询信息
docs.title: 账号管理首页模糊查询

docs.text: url: users/all/ 方法: GET 参数: 用户：username { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 1, "role": "管理员", "username": "sunbo", "status": true, "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部" }, { "id": 2, "role": "管理员", "username": "sunbo2", "status": true, "group": "test", "depart": "test" }, { "id": 3, "role": "管理员", "username": "sunbo3", "status": true, "group": "test", "depart": "test" }, { "id": 4, "role": "管理员", "username": "zz", "status": true, "group": "华为数据组", "depart": "核心网运行部" } ], "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 用户列表

docs.text: url: users/department 方法: POST 参数: 部门名: name 示例 { "status": 1, "data": { "id": 6, "name": "test" }, "msg": "添加成功" } id 部门id name 部门名字
docs.title: 添加部门

docs.text: url: users/group 方法: POST 参数: 组名: group_name 部门id: depart_id 示例 { "status": 1, "data": { "group_name": "test", "depart_id": "6", "id": 8 }, "msg": "添加成功" }
docs.title: 添加组

docs.text: url: users/departments/ 方法: GET 示例 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 2, "group_name": "核心网运行部" }, { "id": 3, "group_name": "监控部" }, { "id": 4, "group_name": "业务系统运行部" }, { "id": 5, "group_name": "移动互联网" }, { "id": 6, "group_name": "test" } ], "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 查询所有部门

docs.text: url: users/department/groups/ 方法: GET 参数: 部门: depart_name 示例 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "id": 2, "group_name": "华为数据组" }, { "id": 3, "group_name": "诺基亚组" } ], "msg": "查询成功" }
docs.title: 查询部门下所有组

docs.text: url: users/group/tools/ 方法: GET 参数: 组名: group_name
docs.title: 查询组下所有工具

docs.text: url: users/group/users/ 方法: GET 参数: 组名: group_name
docs.title: 查询组下所有成员

docs.text: url: users/detailInfo/ 方法: GET 参数:无 { "status": 1, "data": [ { "name": "核心网运行部", "key": "front_one", "id": 2, "children": [ { "name": "华为数据组", "key": "front_two", "id": 2, "children": [] }, { "name": "诺基亚组", "key": "front_two", "id": 3, "children": [] } ] }, { "name": "监控部", "key": "front_one", "id": 3, "children": [ { "name": "chatops小组", "key": "front_two", "id": 4, "children": [] }, { "name": "C&M小组", "key": "front_two", "id": 5, "children": [] } ] }, { "name": "业务系统运行部", "key": "front_one", "id": 4, "children": [] }, { "name": "移动互联网", "key": "front_one", "id": 5, "children": [ { "name": "EPC组", "key": "front_two", "id": 6, "children": [] }, { "name": "大IP组", "key": "front_two", "id": 7, "children": [] } ] }, { "name": "test", "key": "front_one", "id": 6, "children": [ { "name": "test", "key": "front_two", "id": 8, "children": [] }, { "name": "test2", "key": "front_two", "id": 9, "children": [] } ] } ], "msg": "请求成功" }
docs.title: 首页部门组合工具信息接口
